business.pricing: Estate packages begin at $450 and include research, inspection, and documentation.

content.about: Boston Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Boston area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Patricia T.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Linda T.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Patricia B.
reviews.content: Knowledgeable about antiques, though communication could have been better during the process.

business.pricing: Single-item opinions from $125; multi-piece engagements receive tailored pricing.

content.about: Doyle Auctions – New England/Boston Office provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art. With Founded nationally in 1962 ([9]) experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Boston area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Elizabeth J.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: James R.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Susan D.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

business.pricing: Initial consultation from $150; comprehensive reports quoted per project.
